mapper.select: select srr.*,concat_ws('-',cb.no,cbu.no,cbue.room_number) as room_name,ur.name as repair_name,su.actual_name as dispatch_name from sys_report_repair as srr,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,user_resident as ur,sys_dispatch_list as sdl left JOIN sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld on sdl.id = sdld.dispatch_list_id left JOIN sys_user as su on sdld.create_id = su.id where srr.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and ur.id = srr.repairman and sdl.id = srr.dispatch_list_id and srr.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_report_repair( code, dispatch_list_id, type, repairman, building_unit_estate_id, tel, repair_date, froms, report_detail, create_id, create_date ) values ( #{code}, #{dispatchListId}, #{type}, #{repairman}, #{buildingUnitEstateId}, #{tel}, #{repairDate}, #{froms}, #{reportDetail}, #{createId}, #{createDate} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update:
update sys_report_repair
type = #{type},
repairman = #{repairman},
tel = #{tel},
froms = #{froms},
appointment_time = #{appointmentTime},
report_detail = #{reportDetail},
modify_id = #{modifyId}, modify_date = #{modifyDate}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select building_unit_estate_id from cpm_resident_estate where resident_id = #{repairman} limit 1
